statements: UPDATE user_diet_preferences SET name = 'John Doe', age = 30 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_diet_preferences SET dietary_preferences = '{"vegan": true, "gluten_free": true}', allergies = '{"nuts": true}' WHERE user_id = '876e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174999';
UPDATE user_diet_preferences SET dietary_preferences = '{"vegetarian": true, "gluten_free": true}' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE user_diet_preferences SET name = 'John Doe', age = 30, gender = 'Male', allergies = '{"peanuts": true, "dairy": true}' WHERE user_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE users SET dietary_preferences = ARRAY['vegetarian', 'vegan'] WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE recipes SET ingredients = ARRAY['flour', 'sugar', 'butter'], instructions = 'Mix ingredients and bake at 350°F for 30 minutes' WHERE recipe_id = '987e6543-b21c-23d4-f321-987654abc012';

UPDATE recipes SET instructions = ARRAY['Step 1: Preheat the oven', 'Step 2: Mix the ingredients'] WHERE recipe_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-1a2b-3c4d-5e6f7a8b9c0'
UPDATE UserPreferences SET dietary_preference = 'Vegetarian' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE Recipes SET ingredients = 'Tomatoes, Bell Peppers, Onions' WHERE recipe_id = 10;
UPDATE UserPreferences SET dietary_preference = 'Vegetarian', allergies = 'Peanuts, Gluten' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE Recipes SET ingredients = '1 cup chopped tomatoes, 1/2 cup chopped onions, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tsp olive oil' WHERE recipe_id = 201;
UPDATE users SET dietary_preference = 'Vegetarian' WHERE username = 'Alice';
UPDATE recipes SET ingredients = '{"main": "chicken", "sides": ["rice", "salad"]}' WHERE recipe_name = 'Grilled Chicken';
UPDATE users SET dietary_preference = 'Vegan' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE users SET age = 30, dietary_preference = 'Vegetarian' WHERE user_id = '25e33a6c-8567-4e0e-8d2c-4a66953e61b0';
